All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ArgumentAlgorithm
Enum representing sorting algorithms and their associated symbol codes.
ArgumentFieldSize
Utility class for validating and parsing the field size argument.
ArgumentOrientation
Enum representing valid orientation arguments.
ArgumentType
Enum representing the valid argument types.
ArgumentUnit
Utility class for handling and validating troop units represented as strings.
ArgumentValidator
Class responsible for validating and parsing command-line arguments related to the game's configuration such as algorithm, type, units, orientation, and battlefield size.
Battlefield
Represents a square battlefield with combat units.
BattlefieldFormationFactory
Factory responsible for creating and setting up a Battlefield with a given troop formation based on the provided ArgumentValidator.
BattlefieldGenerator
Interface for generating a battlefield matrix of CombatUnits.
BattlefieldPositionGenerator
Utility class responsible for generating unique positions on a battlefield grid.
BattlefieldUI
BattlefieldUI is a JFrame window responsible for displaying the battlefield grid and troops with animations based on a list of grid states.
BattlefieldUnitPopulator
Utility class responsible for populating a battlefield grid with combat units at random unique positions.
BubbleSort<T>
Implementation of the bubble sort algorithm.
BubbleSortTest
 
BubbleSortWithSteps<T>
Extended version of BubbleSort that tracks each step of the sorting process.
CombatUnit
Abstract base class representing a combat unit with a symbol and numeric value.
CombatUnitPrinter
Responsible for printing a matrix of CombatUnit instances to the console using a specified Printer strategy.
CombatUnitPrinterFactory
Factory responsible for creating instances of CombatUnitPrinter based on the desired output format type.
CombatUnitTest
 
Commander
Represents a Commander unit with a fixed symbol and value.
Doctor
Represents a Doctor unit with a fixed symbol and value.
EastFormation
EastFormation arranges troops by reversing the order of the WestFormation arrangement.
Empty
Represents an Empty unit on the battlefield.
FieldSizeAndTroopsValidate
Validates the battlefield size against the total number of troops.
FormationStrategy
Interface defining the strategy to arrange troops on a battlefield.
FormationStrategyFactory
Factory class to create FormationStrategy instances based on the given orientation string.
Grid<T>
A generic class that represents a two-dimensional grid structure.
GridBuilder
Responsible for building a list of Grid instances from a Legion's memory steps.
GridInitializer
Utility class to initialize a grid (matrix) of CombatUnit objects.
GridUI
GridUI is a JPanel component that displays a grid layout with a specified number of rows and columns.
Infantry
Represents an Infantry combat unit.
Legion
 
LegionFactory
Factory class responsible for creating and initializing instances of Legion.
ListMatrixConverter
Utility class for converting between List of Lists (matrix) and flat List structures.
MemoryStepHandler<T>
An in-memory implementation of the StepHandler interface.
MergeSort<T>
Implementation of the merge sort algorithm.
MergeSortTest
 
MergeSortWithSteps<T>
Extended version of MergeSort that tracks each step of the sorting process.
NoExistsBattlefieldException
Exception thrown when an expected battlefield does not exist or is null.
NorthFormation
NorthFormation arranges troops on the battlefield facing north.
NumericFormatterUnit
Formatter that converts CombatUnit instances to their numeric string representation.
Printer<T>
Interface for formatting and spacing elements of type T.
QuickSort<T>
Implementation of the quick sort algorithm.
QuickSortWithSteps<T>
Extended version of QuickSort that tracks each step of the sorting process.
RandomHelper
Utility class for generating random integers within specified ranges.
RandomUtilsTest
 
SelectionSort<T>
Implementation of the Selection Sort algorithm.
SelectionSortWithSteps<T>
Extended version of SelectionSort that tracks each step of the sorting process.
Sniper
Represents a Sniper combat unit.
SortingStrategy<T>
A generic strategy interface for sorting algorithms.
SortingStrategyFactory
Factory class to create SortingStrategy instances for sorting CombatUnit lists with step tracking.
SortingStrategyL<T>
Interface defining the sorting strategy with ascending and descending sort methods.
SouthFormation
SouthFormation arranges troops on the battlefield facing south.
SquareBattlefieldGenerator
Implementation of BattlefieldGenerator that generates a square battlefield.
StepHandler<T>
A handler interface used to track the steps of a sorting algorithm.
SymbolFormatterUnit
Formatter that converts CombatUnit instances to their symbol string representation.
Tank
Represents a Tank combat unit.
TroopFactory
Factory class to create a list of CombatUnit instances based on quantity specifications.
TroopFinder
Utility class to find all instances of a specific CombatUnit type within a grid.
TroopFormation
Represents a troop formation on a battlefield, applying a specific formation strategy to arrange units.
TroopOrder
Provides the default order of troop units used in formations.
TroopRandomFactory
Factory class responsible for creating a randomized list of CombatUnit instances based on the given troop quantities.
Troops
Entry point class for the Troops application.
TroopsExceededBattlefiedException
Exception thrown when the number of troops exceeds the battlefield capacity.
TroopUI
TroopUI is a JPanel component responsible for displaying a combat unit image with a specific size and orientation.
UnitRepresentation<T>
Interface defining methods for representing a unit in different processed forms.
WestFormation
WestFormation arranges troops on the battlefield facing west.
